name: Spisix (mini jam)
description:
Spizzy, the fox wakes up in an unknown place, trapped inside a ball. She needs your help to escape this prison, can you save her?

Controls:
- Interact and direct Spizzy by clicking/touching and releasing
- Holding the mouse down spins Spizzy. The faster, the stronger the launch

Notes:
- Walls need some force to crack so be sure to have a strong launch
- Bumpers (circles) bounce and increase Spizzys' speed
- Hard Walls (lozenges) are unbreakable
- Spikes are bad, so long as you hit them hard enough
There are 7 levels in total and Game Over takes you back to the start.
It takes 5 seconds until the game switches to the next dream. This was done so that the Player can see his "score" (how long he took to clear the dream). Only the ending is exited by clicking.

Jam:
This game was made during the Mini Jam (May 4th-8th 2018).
As I hadn't realized that the 4 colors were meant to be constant I later updated to version 0.0.6 which complies to correct the problem.

Versions:
0.0.5 was the original Jam submission
0.0.6 has several corrections
0.0.7 has brand new music tracks (longer too) and is slower at loading
